title: Will sejuani get nerfed anytime soon ?
body:
http://na.op.gg/champion/sejuani/statistics/jungle

51.4% win rate, 21% pick rate. 33% ban rate.
I mean, I would like to move during teamfights, Idk about you guys, but I like moving. Every game vs. her is a damn chore. I gotta babysit my bot lane not to get ulted at 6 and get double killed. Then in teamfights that aoe stun ult is just insane. Her passive is dumb. Qss is cool yeah, but she literally has CC in every ability of hers. Like what the hell. Knockup, slow, stun, stun.

replies.body:
Is win rate the only thing anyone uses to determine if a champion is over-tuned these days? pick and ban rates are cool an all and when you see champions with like an 80% ban rate or higher its safe to say yes something is up... But call me crazy, what if instead of just spewing out a win rate and stats we looked up on some website we didn't design, what if we listed the reasons why we think Sej is too strong? Then after that we can compare her to her contemporaries (other tank junglers) to see is she too strong in comparison to them too? Then after the comparison we then listed possible suggestions on how to balance her. Seems more productive than just saying something is OP and then letting the community go crazy!

I agree Sej is a bit too strong currently, but for me I think her Damage output as a full tank jungler is a good place to start! Most tank junglers cannot 100-0 an ADC 1v1, but somehow I have seen Sej do it multiple times! So I would start by some base stat nerfs on her skills, and maybe make her Winter's Wrath skill scale off the enemy max HP instead of her Max HP in order to allow the Carries some breathing room, while increasing her potential vs tanks!
See has a AoE Stun ult? Pretty sure it can only stun 1 person lol.
Hasn't she been nerfed 3 times in a row now?
